src:
Evropske kvalifikacije za OI: Poznat raspored srpskih odbojkaša
01 Nov 2019, 15:15 by Zile
Odbojkaši Srbije igraće u januaru u Berlinu na turniru evropskih kvalifikacija za OI u Tokiju, a objavljen je i raspored odigravanja mečeva.
Aktuelni prvaci Evrope prvi meč odigraće u dvorani „Maks Šmeling“ u nedelju 5. januara od 13.30 časova, a rival će biti selekcija Francuske.
Dan kasnije od 14 časova rival će biti Holandija, a poslednji protivnik u grupi u sredu 8. januara od 17 sati biće reprezentacija Bugarske.
U drugoj grupi su Nemačka, Belgija, Slovenija i Češka, a plasman u polufinale obezbediće po dve prvoplasirane ekipe iz obe grupe. Na Olimpijskim igrama u Tokiju igraće samo pobednik turnira.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
European Olympic qualifications: Known schedule for Serbian volleyball players
01 Nov 2019, 14:15 by Zile
Serbia's volleyball players will play in Berlin in the European Qualifying Tournament in Tokyo in January, and a schedule of match play has been announced.
The current European champions will play their first match at the Max Schmeling on Sunday 5 January at 13.30, with the French selection being the rival.
A day later than 2pm, the rival will be the Netherlands, and the last opponent in the group will be the Bulgarian national team on Wednesday 8 January from 5pm.
In the second group are Germany, Belgium, Slovenia and the Czech Republic, and the placement in the semi-finals will ensure two first-placed teams from both groups. Only the winner of the tournament will play at the Tokyo Olympics.
